section.title: Configuration
section.para: In order to enable the file system store navigate to System Storage. Enter a non-existing or empty directory into the location entry field and press the Convert button.

The location entered has to be a non-existing or empty directory in the server where Package Drone is running. The Package Drone process user (normally pdrone) requires write access in the parent directory if the directory does not exists, and write permissions for the directory otherwise.
Enabling the store will write this information to database and write out a simple marker file into the directory.
